name: Marduk
description: Supreme god who defeated chaos monster Tiamat and created the world from her body

name: Inanna
description: Queen of heaven and earth, goddess of love and warfare, known for her descent to the underworld

name: Enki
description: God of wisdom and fresh waters, creator of humans, keeper of divine knowledge

name: Ashur
description: National god of Assyria, god of war and cosmic order

name: Ra
description: Sun god who travels across sky daily, represents life force and divine order

name: Osiris
description: God of the afterlife and resurrection, murdered and restored by Isis

name: Isis
description: Great mother goddess, master of magic, devoted wife who resurrected Osiris

name: Thoth
description: God of wisdom, writing, and magic, keeper of divine knowledge

name: Horus
description: Sky god and son of Osiris, represents the living pharaoh

name: Zeus
description: King of the gods, ruler of sky and thunder, father of gods and men

name: Athena
description: Goddess of wisdom and strategic warfare, patron of Athens

name: Hermes
description: Messenger god, guide of souls, god of commerce and thieves

name: Aphrodite
description: Goddess of love and beauty, born from sea foam

name: Apollo
description: God of sun, music, healing, and prophecy
